user_query: I'm planning a surprise trip for my partner. Find me a destination with the most popular hashtag on Instagram and check if the desired domain name with a .com extension is available. Also, verify if the chosen username is taken on Wikipedia.

TaskList.description: Fetch the most popular travel destination hashtags from Instagram.
Check the availability of a .com domain name based on the chosen destination.
Verify if the chosen username is available on Wikipedia.
